content.detailedDescription: I drove home just as it was dark . no one else was on the road but ahead i could see lights that looked like a tractor or grader up ahead, when i got close enough to switch my brights off the lights changed from a few dim lights to very bright stadium like lights shining into my winshield moving at the same speed i was traveling forward but moving backwards keeping pace with me, i slowed down then went as fast as the truck would go panicing. eventually in a instant the lights took off upward and away leaving a bright trail and became a point in the sky like a star
content.summary: drove twards slow moving lights on road and flicked my brights off.Hovered on the hood of my truck then took off leaving a bright trail

content.detailedDescription:
1. watching the moon.
2. movement.
3. drone
4. 3-100 small orbs moving like a school of fish or birds.
5. excited.
6. moved past field of view.
content.summary: Dozens of ufos changing formations from v-shape to line

content.detailedDescription: It was mid-march 2014. i was out having a smoke (live in a non-smoking apartment complex)and looked up (towards the eastern direction) as i always do to see the clouds (we have beautiful clouds) and spotted what i thought might be a plane. i noticed it was different. it was moving slowly and was to low to be a jet-plane and had no sound. it was cigar shaped with a cigar type band of symbols, which may have been a reddish or orange color ad reflected a silver-ish color. i made notice of no wings, no tail, no front (like pointy plane nose) but flat ended like a cigar. i proceeded to get out my phone from my pocket. it entered a cloud so i snapped a picture of the cloud and the area to the right that should be its exit place but nothing exited. i waited but after 5 minutes still nothing. it was gone. it was daylight, about four in the afternoon, the blue sky was all with big puff balls type clouds sparsely slowly floating. i see many planes and choppers. this was not something i have seen before. i am 65 and seen many types of aircraft. i have lived in many states and lived near bases. this was not a blimp or a jet. not my first ufo but was ecstatic that i saw this type. i do not know how to put the pics of the cloud on-line but you can see them if you want. don't know if it would help. and saw another one so will post it separate.
content.summary: Object passing in sky southward then entered a cloud and disapeared

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Came out back of house to go around front to car,  saw very bright light low on western horizon pathing south.  got in car to chase object at which point it appeared to hover and believe iy descended.  lost sight while driving to better vantage point. was strange drive.  noted dog coming from direction object seen with blank stare on face, on way back to house man tried to rush my van while moving thirty mph. incidents likely unrelated but odd..
content.summary: Very bright slow-moving ball of light pathed south, hovered then appeared to descend.

content.detailedDescription: Bright green light in the sky flying low,
content.summary: Bright green glowing lights dancing over a home.

content.detailedDescription:
5 miles south of lake ontario...I was driving north and saw a very bright yellowish light, i thought it was a plane, but it would have been either very large, or very close. as i was driving north, it kept getting lower and lower and i'm thinking, it's going to either land or crash. as i turned and started heading east, i saw another one...As i was driving about 55, it appeared to be moving to the east also, but that could have been an optical illusion as it was so large. there appeared to be smoke trails following it. i arrived at my destination and walked around the side of the building where another customer approached me and asked if i was ok...I pointed to the sky. 
we could see 2 of the very large bright lights, and as we watched the surrounding sky was turning different shades of pale red. after i came out of the store and started heading north again, i noticed a group of people in  a parking lot watching one and taking pictures. i stopped and asked if we were getting invaded and they were like...Maybe...I drove home heading west and saw 2 of them...One got  lower and lower and finally went out, but the other appeared to be traveling west. 
i arrived home and looked north and could see one through the trees. i ran inside for my camera, but when i got back it was gone. walked to the end of the road and the other was gone too. 
i saw this at 12:45 am - 1:10 am.
content.summary: Large bright lights over southern shore of lake ontario 5/18/14 12:45 am

content.detailedDescription:
I was hoping that someone else had seen the same or similar sightings of multiple lights/ufo's near st. maries, idaho.  depending upon the night, there are between 3 to 5 of these objects.  they remain somewhat stationary, hovering only slightly.  looking at them with the naked eye, the light appears elongated: white light on the top and bottom, flashing lights that appear to be rotating that strobe in colors of blue, green, red.  they are high in the sky. on clear evenings they can be seen, night after night, and their location, although varied, remain overhead.  i live on acreage in a fairly isolated location, but this should be able to be seen by others in the area.  one of the lights/ufo's is larger than the rest.  i have had numerous neighbors, friends and family members who have observed them, and so far, everyone concurs that they are not stars (too large), nor are they satellites, as their place in the night sky remains stationary. the one exception to this was one evening about one month ago while i was observing three of these lights, one of the smaller lights that was closest to the larger light (object) began to move away towards the southwest, slowly. within approximately 5 to 10 seconds, it suddenly disappeared. i did not see it increase speed, rather it seemed to "blink out". there is never any sound attached to these objects, so a helicopter or a plane can be ruled out. they are high in the sky, but the naked eye can detect the color they flash--especially visible with the largest, brightest light/ufo.  

this has been a nightly occurrence for many months, which makes the situation more confusing than if it were a one-time event.  i was hoping that someone connected with mufon in the idaho area would be willing to investigate.  i can just about guarantee that on a clear night, they'll be visible.  

there have been no strange occurrences attached with these sightings that i am aware of.
content.summary: Multiple unexplained flashing lights, 3 - 5 hovering objects observed on consecutive nights

content.detailedDescription: We were harvesting south of sprague, wa.  we had eaten lunch and had all climbed into the loaded wheat truck.  the other truck driver and myself were sitting in the bed of the truck.  the other two men were in the cab of the truck. something caught my eye and i observed a silverish/glowing cigar shaped object streaking across the southern horizon.  this thing was really moving.  i pounded on the top of the truck and told the driver to stop.  we all 4 saw it.  we were all kind of dumbfounded.  it was a mutual agreement that it wasn't an airplane.  the object was going faster than anything i had or have ever seen.  the ufo went from east to west then turned north and out of our view.  we talked about it for a bit then just went on about our business of harvesting.  when i got home later that month there was an article in the odessa record about it.  many had also seen it. i'm surprised this incident has never been documented.
content.summary: After harvest lunch, 4 of us all saw it.  very high rate of speed.  streaked across the southern horizon, then out of sight.  no contrail, was close enough you could see it wasn't a plane.

content.detailedDescription: A cross shaped object was observed by myself and two other people as we sat outside smoking cigarettes. one of the other witnesses was the first to spot it, and instantly stated "what the f is that?" myself and the third witness then looked up and saw it. it was traveling eastward, moving at a tremendous pace. the object did not have navigation lights like an aircraft, and if it was an aircraft, it was flying over a well populated city with constant air traffic with no illumination of any sort, and that is a disaster waiting to happen. the object was not using lights of any kind, it truly seemed that the lights from the city were reflecting off of it, causing it to be greatly reflective until it moved beyond their reach. at the moment that the light no longer reflected off of the object, it was still visible but only by looking next to the object, as you would a distant and dim star. when the object became difficult to observe, it seemed to slow way down and just hang in the air like it was hovering for a few seconds and then resumed moving. no sound was emitted. when first spotted, the object was flying due east, then we all watched it change direction to a north easterly heading. myself and the person who spotted the object first both served in the army, myself being a paratrooper. there are no aircraft that looks even remotely similar to this object.
content.summary: It was either so low it made no sound or so large that detail was very good from an altitude, changed course, no nav lights, when its lights faded, it almost seemed to pause and wait before continuing, at that point you needed to look next to it to see tt

content.detailedDescription: I was on walk with the dog and looked into the sky suddenly i saw a round white ufo it flys straight through the sky in a line... sometimes it  disappeared  my girlfriend saw this too... the hole event tooks 30 seconds..
content.summary: A round light flys straight over the city sometimes it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling into my drive way, i had never seen anything like it before and have been around aircraft all my life.When i first noticed it i thought it was a star but then i quckly noticed it was moving very fast moving from northeast toward the west it then stoped dead and hovered for about 5 min. it was kind of domed shaped on top but flat on the bottom there was no soun and the color it seemed to be glowing it was bluish green very bright in color. after the sighting sighting i almost couldnt believe what i had seen, told my family what i had seen right after the sighting i was vey excited. it went back toward the north east very fast it was out of my sight within a half of a second if i would have blinked i would have missed its leaving
content.summary: I watched a bright grenish blue object flying fron the northeast moving west i then witnessed it hovering maybe a mile and a half from me after watching it for about 5 min it left the area backnortheast if i would have blinked i would have missed it.

content.detailedDescription: Driving along 507 toward route 84. girlfriend pointed to large red object slowly moving across sky from north to south over lake wallenpaupack.  pulled car over and got out to observe light moving slowly and dropped flares on two occasions over a two minute span. light faded then disappeared.
content.summary: Red light dropping flares over lake

content.detailedDescription: I was walking dog like around 9:40pm, i always sky watch, saw a few planes. then suddenly coming from the south i saw the red lights, not regular like any plane, moved very fat toward me, it was boomerang shape different red color,maybe change a bit, but heard low hum.It hovered afew sec. then darted so fast to south west, i saw it behind the trees then gone like zip
content.summary: Was walking dog saw the unusual color of red lights an boomerang shape, heard the hum, it came in from south and hovered then darted south west fast to gulf

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog,to my left were 4 yellow lights in a  square formation,then appeared an outline of a craft within the lights,on a 45 degree angle.
it divided into 2 pairs of vertical lights,and they spread apart for a minute,then went in the opposite direction,and a minute later out of sight.
i stopped and was watching,wondering if anyone else was seeing what i saw.
content.summary: 4 yellow lights,divided in two,then again

content.detailedDescription:
Ok i'm on streesprings norad for crying out loud and what i know who i am what they see us clearly on the true negativesnegati































ves fromm true photos ground from above and cameras on street lights i'm so tired right know if you really want to play hope you can match there abilities cause the general s not going to share its so i can get someone anyone to defy the order's stay away from me they got me covered who's they i have what you consider
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: On street corner full traffic look up sw at very bright star like light then light starts with big leap inside atmosphere yell at any to just look it real then it changes close above to this red fleshly glowing inside softball size teardrop to straight ab

content.detailedDescription: Unit was not visible to the necked eye. i try to take around 500 digital photos around the hickory airport each week. this week i had taken photos of what i call eye-oval droans or ufo's. this photo was a total surprise, and appears to be operated by someone inside the unit.These objects travel between 2,000 and 4,000 miles per hour. the human eye and brain is not capable of detecting the same. i experience no change while photographing the subjects.
content.summary: Flat platform, dome, magnetic fields both sides on top, magnetic field in front.

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling into my drive way, i had never seen anything like it before and have been around aircraft all my life.When i first noticed it i thought it was a star but then i quckly noticed it was moving very fast moving from northeast toward the west it then stoped dead and hovered for about 5 min. it was kind of domed shaped on top but flat on the bottom there was no soun and the color it seemed to be glowing it was bluish green very bright in color. after the sighting sighting i almost couldnt believe what i had seen, told my family what i had seen right after the sighting i was vey excited. it went back toward the north east very fast it was out of my sight within a half of a second if i would have blinked i would have missed its leaving
content.summary: I watched a bright grenish blue object flying fron the northeast moving west i then witnessed it hovering maybe a mile and a half from me after watching it for about 5 min it left the area backnortheast if i would have blinked i would have missed it.

content.detailedDescription: This activity has been observed for the last few years. activity can only be documented with the aid of a digital camera. i had been recording flying cigars, cones, disc for sometime. on this particular afternoon i was hoping to get more digital shots of the flying cigars. upon viewing the camera cards on the computer, i realized this was not the usual cigars but something else. it was wide, flat and moved through the sky as if being flown under control.Please find attached 6 digital shots, p529-0274 shows the subject coming into view on the lower left. the other 5 digital shots show its path, with the last p529-0279 showing the exit. it would appear that this is a ufo that has under gone mor-pho-sis.
content.summary: Frequent activity in the area.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother went outside to sky watch look for ufo's we do that allot and hope bto see something we got lucky around 10:15 pm my brother went in the side yard we sit in the front yard next to the side gate looking towards the east he lit a cigarette he was under the 20x10 cover in the side i was talking to him looking at him that would be north i lit a cigarette and we were talking and then i looked up and saw a bright white light it was moving fast i pulled my brother out of the side he seen and got the binoculars i tried to take a pic but couldn't make it out it looked like a star on my camera my brother said it was matalic and wobbling it looked like it was wobbling but it would stop go up down side to side then it would take off fast then stop again and do the same thing then it was about 2 minutes and it flickered out a few seconds latter it came back on even brighter than before it was brighter than the brightest star no sound at all it lasted 5 minutes it went farther out where it went behind houses i didnt see it again we have many jet liners flying over the city 24/7 they come from and to san jose,oakland and sfo airports we have jets that fly over my neighborhood we hear them day and night and a helicopter was out with a green and red light on the other jets and other airplanes have strobes and red and blue lights i know what a satellite looks like it isnt close to being as bright as what me and my brother saw and i even see military jets fighter jets and helicopters they go to and come from travis air force base but i never seen such a military presents since we been having all the ufo's the last 3 or 4 years one time me and my brother saw a fighter jet chasing 3 amber reddish orange orbs they flew over my house and all 3 orbs blinked out the fighter jet turned to the left like he was going back to the base i really like to talk to someone about my sightings its easier for me to tell someone than to sit here in bad pain typing i had a call from someone from mufon but it was a broken up message i couldn't get his name or full phone number the reception was broken up ill keep my eyes open and report everything i see
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I went out with my brother to sky watch looking for ufo's at 9:30 pm around 10:15 my brother was at the edge of a cover in the side yard i seen it first and pulled my brother out of the side to see it it lasted 5 min

content.detailedDescription:
Here are the details of my ufo encounter in green bay, wi on may 10th, 2014.

my girlfriend and i were out in the backyard around 6:30 pm cdt cooking dinner on the grill when we noticed that a large group of strange looking clouds were headed our way and passed directly overhead. 

it had been a mostly sunny afternoon with few clouds in the area that day and this group really looked unusual so i started taking photographs of them for about 30 minutes.

after looking at the photographs at a later time we noticed the outline and shadow of a large triangle shaped craft that was completely silent and was moving very slowly with the clouds. 

it seemed to us that these clouds were being generated by this craft as a form of camouflage to hide it. it slowly moved off to the northeast.

we live near the intersection of highway wi-172 and webster ave in green bay, wi.
content.summary: Large black triangle shaped craft  cloaked in clouds hovering

content.detailedDescription: I walked out side to smoke and looked up and saw this exhaust trail going from east to west about mid day on the 15 th of may. i have a picture of what i saw. i never saw an object only the exhaust trail.
content.summary: Straight line exhaust like i've never seen before

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were at the sunset jamaica resort, on our balcony, when my daughter asked what was coming toward our hotel, in the sky. i noticed 8-10 red/orange/purple discs in a v formation, coming over land from over the ocean. there were no other lights in the sky, no antennas nearby, or power lines.  the discs slowly moved toward the hotel, the two by two, they went upwards. we saw pairs flying over "mystic mountain" a few minutes later, then nothing else.
content.summary: 8-10 glowing discs, in a v formation

content.detailedDescription:
On may 16, 2014 i was looking out my bedroom window and i saw what looked like two planes approaching my home. however, as they moved closer, they were clearly not planes. there were two craft. one stopped in a stationary position and the other moved in line with the first and hovered over the houses in my neighborhood for approximately two minutes. they looked like a triangular dome shape. both the top and sides where bright red, like the red of a stop sign. however, at the bottom of the craft were no lights emitted. the bright red light emitted from the crafts were like a halo. they were high up in the sky, and i noticed no planes were flying by during this episode. as, i live near a flight path, there are quite a few planes. however, these were not planes. i have two college degrees and know what i saw! 
the craft appeared to hover for a few minutes, then they began to move backward. not in a turning motion, but in a retracting type motion and slowly moved away until my dad and myself, were not able to see them anymore. the crafts moved very slowly, very fluidly. the motion did not seem to have any type of directionality to it, except for when they moved away. it was weird, because i thought at first they were planes, but they as they moved closer to where i could visualize them better, i saw clearly they were not! it was almost as if they crafts appeared out of nowhere, when i first saw them coming closer.
content.summary: Two craft seen over diamond head/kahala may 2014

content.detailedDescription: First photo was taken when i first noticed light in the sky and objects that appear on the photo were not visible to the naked eye. the other 9 photos were taken 5-16-14 starting at about 8:00 p.M. and took last photo about 9:09 p.M. same night. the last 9 photos was when i went out to the front steps and sat down on steps and propped my hand on the handrails to ensure the camera did not move while taking photos. took last 9 photos in succession in 3 or 4 minutes. when i looked at object it appeared like a bright light in the sky. when i looked through the camera, i could not see the light except only when i zoomed in could i see anything. then i could not see the bright light; all i could see was a small light moving around in the camera lens. it was after the photo was taken that i could see just how much it had moved around while i was taking the picture. i did not lose sight of the object until the sun-up in the morning. these pictures were as the result of the phone call from a gentleman in your organization yesterday to show my hand was not moving when the pictures were taken. please feel free to call me at 334-701-3421 at your convenience.
content.summary: More than one object appears from dusk until dawn continuously

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard talking on the phone, wife came outside when she noticed the light descending from the sky towards the ground. i actually didn't notice the light till about 3-5 minutes later after my wife went back inside the house. i call her back outside to look at this object that is dancing around the sky, she then tells me , that she noticed it earlier. i have video of this light and it changes direction and had no sound what so ever to it. just want to know what this thing is , it made movements that were a bit weird. see it for yourself , this haas been the second time i see this particular light.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light dancing thru the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from thomaston towards cushing maine, when i spotted four or more chemical trails in the sky. the sky was crystal clear blue with unlimited viewing. the chem trails were unusual because of not only the amounts but the designs they left. there was an x design, as well as two lines parallel with dots in the middle. there was one that appeared to show the plane was banking left which appeared to be headed for boston, while another was close and beside it. there was a third chem trail that showed a plane that was coming up fast as if to attempt to intercept the other two. 

these chem trails were strange not only in design but because the closest airport is bangor, and there never been the amount of passenger planes taking off at the same time. 

the next day at work, i was discussing what i had seen, and a co-worker reported she saw the same and had taken some pictures. while we were looking at one of the pictures, when i noticed a black disc high above the chem trails hovering. i pointed it out to her, and she said she did not see that while taking the pictures. we checked other pictures she had taken with her camera and there were no other black spots. 

in summary, i now believe those were military planes that were chasing that flying disc. i have the pictures and will release them only to you. i will swear on oath that the pictures i have are not photo shopped or tampered with. i will mail them at your request. i do not have the camera they were taken with, and i don't want to have my co-worker involved in this matter.
content.summary: A black disc was hovering miles above multiple air craft flying from the north, heading north east.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking from the plane window i saw a golden ball fly in a straight line before descending into the clouds.I shouted a friend of mine who was sitting opposite me across the isle, but the ball vanished before he could get across the isle.At the time we must have been flying at around 30,000 feet and the ball seemed to be lower than the plane, although i could not say how far below the plane.A very short time after seeing this ball, a jet went by our plane at a very high speed.I could not tell if this was a chinese military plane, or if the plane had anything to do with the ball. i was not shocked or surprised by seeing this as i have had quite a few sightings while i have lived in china in the last six years. this was at around 8pm on the 17th may half way between yannang city and the city of shanghai.
i would be very interested to know if anyone saw the same as me on the same night.
content.summary: I was on a plane bound for shanghai from nanyang city in china

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving to work (friday night at 9:45 pm 5-16-14) west on us 30 a few miles east of rt. 21. visibility was good. i saw what looked like new radio tower lights north of the road a mile ahead. getting closer i asked my wife what she thought we were seeing.  five bright red lights were floating slowly across the road, maybe 500 feet up. they were at different altitudes and locked in formation with each other. the group must have been several hundred yards long. i slowed down to prolong the sighting. the lights appeared to me to be slightly vertically elongated, so as we passed under them i put my window down for less glass distortion, which didn't change their appearance.  they were in a line from beneath, south of the road as we passed under. i heard no engines, props, etc. five helicopters is absolutely out.  balloons/flares/toy hot air balloons--how were they keeping in line? light was red--not yellow from a flame. too slow--almost hovering--for planes.  way too long for any one craft. no sign of any inter-light rigging. i thought ok--phoenix lights rides again.  i asked a cop at wal-mart if he'd heard any report on the radio and he said no--first he'd heard of it. traffic was light, but some other cars had to have seen it. the group was drifting down from the direction of massillon. i can't say what the wind was there but it was not noticeable at work a few minutes later.
content.summary: Five red lights slowly drifting south across highway locked in formation 500 feet up

content.detailedDescription: On may 15, 2014 at 0650 i felt compelled to take picture of the moon from my front porch. i took one with my tablet but that didn't work as well as i had planned so i used my nikon d3000 with a nikon dx af-s nikon 55-200mm 1:4-5.6g ed lens. i took 2 pictures about 30 seconds apart the first should the moon but when blown up to see the details you can see what looks like an almond shaped craft in a flight path heading behind the moon. the next picture taken just a few seconds later should the object was gone.
content.summary: Some thing lardge flying be the moon

content.detailedDescription: 1 i had just started navy ship fitter school in san diego and was sitting on the ground outside of our welding shop eating lunch. i took a drink of my soda and while tilting my head back noticed the objects in the sky. i had no idea what the objects were because they were reflecting like 2 mirrors being aimed at us. the objects looked a few miles in the sky and stated to pulsate up and down beside each other.  both objects went straight up until out of sight.  there were about 25 others guys sitting there with me who saw it. it was really the first time that i thought about ufo,  but from that day on i believed in  ufos. the 2 objects just flew straight up until out of sight.
content.summary: Observed 2 mirror like objects. a few miles up in the sky. no clouds, blue skies. both objects reflected like 2 mirrors. objects hovered in 1 spot then started to move up and down beside each other. objects went straight up until out of sight.2 objects
